thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Friday, 27 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Donlinks Int'l Swings To Net Loss In 2017, To Implement Delisting Risk Warning

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Donlinks Int'l Swings To Net Loss In 2017, To Implement Delisting Risk Warning

organizations.name: reuters) - donlinks international investment co ltd

text:
April 27 (Reuters) - Donlinks International Investment Co Ltd:
* SAYS IT SWINGS TO NET LOSS OF 2.4 BILLION YUAN ($378.80 million) IN 2017 VERSUS NET PROFIT OF 19.5 MILLION YUAN YEAR AGO
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO HALT ON MAY 2 AS IT WILL IMPLEMENT DELISTING RISK WARNING, TO RESUME ON MAY 3 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2HS1pqx ; bit.ly/2Hwe271 Further company coverage: ($1 = 6.3358 Chinese yuan renminbi) (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
